util

类 AssetDatabaseOpenHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.AssetDatabaseOpenHelper

  • public class AssetDatabaseOpenHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    AssetDatabaseOpenHelper
    • Auto copy databse form assets to /data/data/package_name/databases
    • You can use it like SQLiteDatabase, use getWritableDatabase() to create and/or open a database that will be used for reading and writing. use getReadableDatabase() to create and/or open a database that will be used for reading only.
    作者:
    Blank

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      AssetDatabaseOpenHelper(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String databaseName) 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getDatabaseName()
      获取数据库名称
      android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getReadableDatabase()
      Create and/or open a database that will be used for reading only.
      android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getWritableDatabase()
      Create and/or open a database that will be used for reading and writing.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • AssetDatabaseOpenHelper

        public AssetDatabaseOpenHelper(android.content.Context context,
                               java.lang.String databaseName)

    • 方法详细资料

      • getWritableDatabase

        public android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getWritableDatabase()
        Create and/or open a database that will be used for reading and writing.
        返回:
        SQLiteDatabase对象
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if cannot copy database from assets
        android.database.sqlite.SQLiteException - if the database cannot be opened

      • getReadableDatabase

        public android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getReadableDatabase()
        Create and/or open a database that will be used for reading only.
        返回:
        SQLiteDatabase对象
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if cannot copy database from assets
        android.database.sqlite.SQLiteException - if the database cannot be opened

      • getDatabaseName

        public java.lang.String getDatabaseName()
        获取数据库名称
        返回:
        the database name
